word:
In Rented Quarters [FOR SEVERAL YEARS 
        THE MEDICAL MISSIONARY WORK IN NASHVILLE WAS 
     CARRIED ON IN RENTED QUARTERS. SISTER WHITE VISITED 
     NASHVILLE IN 1904, AND FROM THAT TIME ON SHE CEASED 
        NOT TO URGE THE ADVISABILITY OF SECURING MORE 
        SUITABLE QUARTERS, UNTIL IN 1906 A PERMANENT 
        HOME WAS PURCHASED FOR THE SANITARIUM WORK.] 


     We have been in Nashville for nearly two weeks. . . .
